dmca.title: Fraud & copyright infringement!
dmca.body:
_____  

From: Beth Fehr [mailto:elizabethfehr@hotmail.com] 
Sent: Thursday, March 24, 2005 3:32 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fraud & copyright infringement!


Dear Sir:
 
It has come to my attention this past week that a person by the name of
Cheryle is running a website by the name of www.lucibellsprimitives.com that
is hosted by your company. I am writing you to inform you that she is
perpetuating a fraud and copyright infringement. 
 
If you go to the opening page of her website you will see a picute of a
barn/building with two white stars in the windows. This picture was taken
off of my website www.the13thcolony.net without my knowledge or permission.
I am the author of this picture and all others mentioned in this letter,
therefore I own the copyright to them. This picture can be found on my
website under "The Farmer's Daughter".
 
If you go to Lucibells Country Store page you will see a picture of a
burgandy building with an antique wagon. I stenciled "Country Store" on the
wagon and Lucilbell super-imposed "Lucibells Primitives" on the image. This
is a picture of my store, The 13th Colony, located in Minocqua WI. This
picture can be seen on my website on the home page if you scroll down
towards the
bottom. 
 
If you go into her "Primitive Wares & Needful Things" page, the picture in
the upper left hand corner is a picture of a display in my store that she
took off of my website. This picture is no longer on my website but I would
be happy to take a picture of this today and email it to you for proof.
Please let me know if you would like me to do so.
 
On same page "primitives & needful things" scroll down to bottom and click
"next". The page that comes up once again uses that same picture in the
upper left hand corner. Now scroll down and you will see a picture of what
she claims to be an antique windsor chair from the 1800's in mint condition
that she has sold. WELL........ go to my website and click on "Furniture"
now click on "Windsors", scroll down and you will see the exact same
picture, HOWEVER this is not an antique, and nowhere do I try to represent
it as one!!
 
Cheryle goes even further into fraud and copyright infringement on her ebay
store, "lucibellsprimitives". I have contacted the designated agent for ebay
and have informed them of her misrepresentation.
 
At this time I wish to handle this matter swiftly and to my satisfaction
without legal assistance. However, I have been in contact with an attorney
and will follow up with him if this matter is not resolved immediately. 
 
I do know that if you are in fact the hosting company for her website you
are under the same laws as ebay and must shut her down immediately. If you
are not the host I would appreciate that you contact me and tell me so I can
continue my pursuit.
 
I, Elizabeth Fehr, have a good faith belief that the use of the previously
mentioned material is not authorized by me, the copyright owner, its agent
or the law.
 
I, Elizabeth Fehr, swear that the above statement and information in this
notification is accurate, and under penalty of perjury, that I am authorized
to act on behalf of The 13th Colony and its website the13thcolony.net, the
owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
 
Sincerely,
Elizabeth A. Fehr
Owner of The 13th Colony
 
The 13th Colony
7735 Hwy 51 S.
P.O. Box 615
Minocqua, WI 54548
715-358-6600
715-358-6861 (fax)
715-356-9381 (home)
715-892-1244 (cell)
 
email:elizabethfehr@hotmail.com
